affiliate_placement.strategy: Place affiliate links in high-engagement content sections
affiliate_placement.format: Natural product recommendations, not obvious ads

content_optimization.approach: Create content specifically around affiliate products
content_optimization.keyword_focus: Problem-solution keywords that lead to purchases
content_optimization.call_to_action: Strong, specific CTAs that drive clicks

performance_tracking.metric: Track click-through rates per content type
performance_tracking.testing: A/B test different affiliate product combinations
